name: Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument
description: 13,000 years ago, Alibates Flint was used by mammoth hunters as a source of flint for tools. Learn how important this site was to the survival, commerce, and culture of the people of the High Plains.
shortDescription: 13,000 years ago, Alibates Flint was used by mammoth hunters as a source of flint for tools. Learn how important this site was to the survival, commerce, and culture of the people of the High Plains.

operatingHours.description: Alibates Visitor Center has museum exhibits, theater, bookstore, and a 7 themed garden with a Monarch Waystation and other native plants. The Alibates Flint Quarries are accessible by guided tour only. Please call for reservations. There is a short self-guided walking trail with an accompanying brochure that lets you see the Canadian River Valley.

climate.weatherDescription: The Texas Panhandle experiences a wide variety of weather conditions throughout the year. Winters are cold and windy, and summers are hot and dry. It is usually a good idea to bring a jacket with you if you are planning on hiking to the quarries with a ranger because the mesa gets very windy, even in the summer.

images.title: Turtle Petroglyph
images.altText: Turtle Petroglyph at Antelope Creek Village Site
images.caption: Turtle Petroglyph at Antelope Creek Village Site

images.title: Alibates Visitor Center
images.altText: A view of the gardens and Alibates Visitor Center.
images.caption: The gardens and Alibates Visitor Center host activities and ranger-led programs throughout the year.

images.title: Alibates Flint
images.caption: Used for at least 13,000 years, Alibates Flint was the choice of many tribes for their stone tools, spearpoints and arrowheads.

images.title: Alibates Flint Quarries Trail
images.altText: Stair steps up the Alibates Flint Quarries Trail.
images.caption: Take a hike up the Quarries Trail to learn about this important stone.

images.title: Snowy Alibates
images.altText: A snowy mesa, as seen from the Alibates Visitor Center.
images.caption: Every season hold special beauty at Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument.
